shortDesc: Help merchants manage products and members, providing verifiable digital assets and marketing tools through Web3.
role: Core Developer ¬∑ React Native Main App
fullDesc:
Complete Web3 smart retail ecosystem. Merchants manage and analyze products via admin dashboard, customers scan product tags to unlock product info, special promotions, NFTs and rewards, with third-party wallet integration.

Tech stack: React Native main app, Swift App Clips scanning, Next.js backend server and full CMS.

hero.title: Berify
hero.description: A commercial Web3 solution connecting physical merchandise with digital assets. NFC verification and marketing automation powering a complete O2O retail ecosystem.

context.description: Berify is a Web3-powered O2O retail ecosystem featuring NFC verification and marketing automation. The system uses a distributed architecture:

challenges.title: Large-Scale Schema Engineering
challenges.achievement: Managed **114 DB migrations** and designed a core schema with **50+ tables**
details: NFT minting and product binding data models
Shopify product sync and inventory tracking

challenges.title: High-Reliability Microservices
challenges.achievement: Engineered **Berify-Queue** service to handle async push notifications and NFT assignments
details: Ensures task atomicity, prevents duplicate execution
Supports push scheduling and batch processing
Error retry and dead letter queue mechanisms

challenges.title: Ecosystem Interoperability
challenges.achievement: Built deep integrations with **Shopify API** (O2O commerce) and **Arbitrum Nova** (automated NFT distribution)
details: Shopify discount code generation and redemption
Web3 wallet connection and NFT claiming
